document.full_text: a libyan government spokesman says 11 muslim clerics were killed in their sleep by a nato airstrike on the eastern oil town of brega.
document.title: gadhafi taunts nato; regime says 11 clerics killed
lines_and_colors: a libyan government spokesman says 11 muslim clerics were killed in their sleep by a nato airstrike on the eastern oil town of brega.
